titles.title: Hushed Was The Evening Hymn (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hushed was the evening hymn The temple courts were dark The lamp was burning dim Before the sacred ark When suddenly a voice divine Rang through the silence of the shrine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The old man meek and mild The priest of Israel slept His watch the temple child The little Levite kept And what from Eli's sense was sealed The Lord to Hannah's son revealed{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O give me Samuel's ear The open ear O Lord Alive and quick to hear Each whisper of Thy word Like him to answer at Thy call And to obey Thee first of all{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O give me Samuel's heart A lowly heart that waits Where in Thy house Thou art Or watches at Thy gates By day and night a heart that still Moves at the breathing of Thy will{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O give me Samuel's mind A sweet unmurmuring faith Obedient and resigned To Thee in life and death That I may read with child-like eyes Truths that are hidden from the wise{/lang-eng}
